thoughts.text: Based on the results of the google command, I see several interesting destinations to explore. I will use the browse_website command to visit one of the websites and learn more about it.
thoughts.reasoning: Visiting a website will help me learn more about a destination and decide if it is worth exploring further.
thoughts.plan:
- Use the browse_website command to visit one of the websites returned by the google command
- Look for information on the website about the destination, such as location, activities, and accommodations
- Take notes on any interesting information found
- Use the information to plan my next steps
thoughts.criticism: I need to be careful not to spend too much time browsing websites and get distracted from my main goal of exploring the world.
thoughts.speak: I will use the browse_website command to visit one of the websites returned by the google command and learn more about a destination.

args.question: What are some of the best kayaking destinations listed on the website?
